game.name: Dawson's Chess
game.board: Dawson's Chess is played on a 1-row grid containing an arbitrary number of columns. The board is empty at the start of the game.
game.tomove: Place a king on any space of the grid that is neither occupied by nor adjacent to another king.
game.towin: Leave the opponent with no space to legally place a king.

variant.name: Board Length
variant.description: Vary the number of grid columns.
